properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , POINT_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(POINT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "POINT_DATE" , POINT_CONTENT , ORDER_NO FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , POINT_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(POINT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "POINT_DATE" , POINT_CONTENT , ORDER_NO FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND "POINT_DATE" BETWEEN TO_DATE(?) AND TO_DATE(?) AND POINT_AMOUNT > 0

SELECT MEM_NO , POINT_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(POINT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "POINT_DATE" , POINT_CONTENT , ORDER_NO FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND POINT_AMOUNT < 0 AND "POINT_DATE" BETWEEN TO_DATE(?) AND TO_DATE(?)
SELECT MEM_NO , POINT_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(POINT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "POINT_DATE" , POINT_CONTENT , ORDER_NO FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY POINT_DATE ASC
SELECT SUM(POINT_AMOUNT) AS "SUM" FROM POINT GROUP BY MEM_NO HAVING MEM_NO = ?
